columns.name: name
columns.description: The name of the state machine.

columns.name: arn
columns.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) that identifies the state machine.

columns.name: status
columns.description: The current status of the state machine.

columns.name: type
columns.description: The type of the state machine.

columns.name: creation_date
columns.description: The date the state machine is created.

columns.name: definition
columns.description: The Amazon States Language definition of the state machine.

columns.name: role_arn
columns.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the IAM role used when creating this state machine.

columns.name: logging_configuration
columns.description: The LoggingConfiguration data type is used to set CloudWatch Logs options.

columns.name: tags_src
columns.description: The list of tags associated with the state machine.

columns.name: tracing_configuration
columns.description: Selects whether AWS X-Ray tracing is enabled.
